title: An Act authorizing the city of Taunton to establish a separate billing rate for water supplied to manufactured housing communities

abstracts.abstract: By Mrs. Dooner and Mr. Thurber of Somerset, a joint petition (accompanied by bill, Senate, No. 2652) of Kelly A. Dooner, Justin Thurber and Norman J. Orrall (with approval of the mayor and city council) for legislation to authorize the city of Taunton to establish a separate billing rate for water supplied to manufactured housing communities.  Telecommunications, Utilities and Energy.  [Local Approval Received.]

actions.description: Referred to the committee on Telecommunications, Utilities and Energy

related_entities.name: committee on Telecommunications, Utilities and Energy

actions.description: Hearing scheduled for 11/13/2025 from 01:00 PM-05:00 PM in A-1
Hearing rescheduled to 11/13/2025 from 01:00 PM-05:00 PM in B-2                                               and Virtual Hearing location changed
Bill reported favorably by committee and placed in the Orders of the Day for the next session
Read second and ordered to a third reading
Taken out of the Orders of the Day
Read third and passed to be engrossed
Read; and referred to the committee on House Steering, Policy and Scheduling
